translations: n.意图；目的；意向（intent 的复数）

phrs.translation: 专心致志于；抱定决心要实行
n. 意向书；合同之草约

sentences.sentence: To all intents and purposes he was my father.
sentences.translation: 他实际上可以称得上是我的父亲。

sentences.sentence: The two items are, to all intents and purposes, identical.
sentences.translation: 这两件物品几乎完全一样。

sentences.sentence: By 1981 the docks had, to all intents and purposes, closed.
sentences.translation: 到1981年，这些码头几乎等于关闭了。
